## Chart Features <img src="https://apexcharts.com/media/apexcharts-logo.png" width="auto" height="100" align="right" />

***

The provided charts come with a number of features that can be used to enhance the user experience.

These features include:

- **Zooming** - The ability to zoom in on a specific area of the chart.
- **Panning** - The ability to pan across the chart.
- **Data Point Highlighting** - The ability to highlight specific data points.
- **Data Point Selection** - The ability to select specific data points.
- **Data Point Filtering** - The ability to filter out specific data points.
- **Data Point Annotations** - The ability to add annotations to specific data points.

***

<center>

*Charts displayed using [ApexCharts.js](https://apexcharts.com/) and the [apexcharter R package](https://davidgohel.github.io/apexcharter/).*

</center>
